item.title: Debug flask app with Neovim
item.description: After installing Neovim and some plugins. Now I want to try debugging Python project. I created a small Flask app from template with a few apis. And here’s the result. Amazing! Here’s how to Link to heading Prepare a Flask app Link to heading I use this template to generate a Flask app repo. Then I clone my new repo and install the requirements. After that I run the app and test an endpoint to make sure it works.
